# init(copying:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new string, copying the specified code units.

## Declaration

```swift
init(copying codeUnits: UTF8Span)
```

## Discussion

This initializer skips UTF-8 validation because `codeUnits` must contain valid UTF-8.
title: init(copying:)
